review: WOW!  I received this as a Christmas present from my brother.  I did not think it would be so simple to gain access to lots of movies on my TV.  It simply was a matter of plugging in the "Stick", putting the batteries in the remote and turning the TV on.  The setup process was simple and I was watching a movie is no time.  Thanks Amazon!
